caption.center: STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. DUANE FOSTER

opinion.opinion_text:
The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 45 Conn. App. 369 (AC 15530), is denied.
Pamela S. Nagy, special assistant state's attorney, in support of the petition.
Margaret Gaffney Radionovas, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.
